metadata.synopsis: Flash (Larry "Buster" Crabbe) saves Earth from purple death sent by planet Mongo's Ming the Merciless (Charles Middleton).

reviews: The serial's production values compensate for the usual Universal cheapness of stock footage and newsreel sequences.
Third and final (and actually made in 1940) Flash Gordon serial. Still fun.
Though played out against some lavish backdrops, 'Universe' is easily the weakest of the Flash serials.
The prettiest of the Flash Gordon serials, even though like most Universal chapterplays, it is filled with stock footage and choppy editing.
Of course, it's corny and juvenile but that's the point.
